before.title: Document API integrations
before.description:
Create documentation for existing API integrations. Acceptance criteria: 
- Must include endpoints, parameters, and response formats.
- Documentation should be easily accessible.

comments.comment: What API integrations should be prioritized for documentation?
Draft documentation is ready for review.
